bio: An Embedded Systems Engineer with a primary focus on the Yocto Project and systems update integration, specializing in the optimization and configuration of components within embedded devices, including bootloaders, kernels, and user applications. Mainly interested in enhancing the security and trustworthiness of everyday devices. Committed to continuously expanding the knowledge in the field of embedded systems. Regularly participant of conferences, delivered couple speeches at events such as FOSDEM and the Yocto Summit.
